artifacts.advancements.chest_slayer.desc: Send a Possessed Coffer to Davy Jones' locker
artifacts.key.night_vision_goggles.toggl: Switch th' Eyepatch o' the Night
artifacts.tooltip.item.anglers_hat.luck_: Casts %s more levels o' Luck o' yer Sea when fishin'
Casts an extra dose o' Luck o' yer Sea when fishin'
artifacts.tooltip.item.antidote_vessel: Greatly decreases the time of any foul brews
artifacts.tooltip.item.aqua_dashers: Allows ye to walk over the seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.charm_of_sinking: Allows ye to walk under the seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.chorus_totem.cons: A deadly blow sends ye somewhere else instead
artifacts.tooltip.item.chorus_totem.chan: A deadly blow might send ye somewhere else instead
artifacts.tooltip.item.cloud_in_a_bottle: Grants the wearer a second jump in the sky
artifacts.tooltip.item.cowboy_hat: Increases the sailin' speed of mounted steeds
artifacts.tooltip.item.cross_necklace: Lengthens invincibility after takin' a hit
artifacts.tooltip.item.crystal_heart: Increases the sturdiness of yer hull
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.drin: Allows ye to drink yer grog faster
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.eati: Cuts down the chewin' time for grub
artifacts.tooltip.item.drinking_hat.spec: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
artifacts.tooltip.item.fire_gauntlet: Sets the wearer's melee strikes ablaze
artifacts.tooltip.item.flame_pendant.fir: Grants immunity to fire after settin' an attacker aflame
artifacts.tooltip.item.golden_hook: Gives ye more balls o' wisdom from vanquished creatures
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.k: Hoist %s while in th' skies to start swimmin'
artifacts.tooltip.item.helium_flamingo.s: Allows ye to swim in th' skies for a short time
artifacts.tooltip.item.kitty_slippers: Keeps creepers at bay from th' wearer
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.multi: Applies %s more levels o' fortune to mined rocks
artifacts.tooltip.item.lucky_scarf.singl: Applies an extra dose o' fortune to mined rocks
artifacts.tooltip.item.night_vision_gogg: Allows ye to see in the dark
Allows ye to see in the dark a bit
artifacts.tooltip.item.obsidian_skull: Gives you Flame's Bane for a short while when ye are hurt by embers
artifacts.tooltip.item.onion_ring: Boosts yer diggin' speed after a munch
artifacts.tooltip.item.panic_necklace: Speeds up the wearer after takin' damage
artifacts.tooltip.item.pickaxe_heater: Turns mined ore into metal straightaway
artifacts.tooltip.item.pocket_piston: Increases blowback dealt by yer attacks
artifacts.tooltip.item.rooted_boots: Slowly fills yer belly while treadin' on grass
artifacts.tooltip.item.running_shoes.ste: Makes ye step higher when wobblin' at speed
artifacts.tooltip.item.shock_pendant.lig: Protects ye from th' Flash o' the Skies
artifacts.tooltip.item.shock_pendant.str: Has a chance to strike attackers with the Flash o' the Skies
artifacts.tooltip.item.snorkel.infinite: Allows ye to breathe when overboard
artifacts.tooltip.item.snorkel.limited: Allows ye to breathe when overboard for a short time
artifacts.tooltip.item.snowshoes.powder_: Lets ye march on Snowier Snow without sinkin'
artifacts.tooltip.item.snowshoes.slipper: Aids in grip on icy paths
artifacts.tooltip.item.steadfast_spikes: Helps ye keep yer footing during stormy seas
artifacts.tooltip.item.superstitious_hat: Applies %s more levels o' lootin' to vanquished foes
Applies an extra dose o' lootin' to vanquished foes
artifacts.tooltip.item.thorn_pendant: Has a chance to damage yer attackers
artifacts.tooltip.item.umbrella.shield: Can be wielded as a targe
artifacts.tooltip.item.vampiric_glove.co: Allows ye to absorb the life force of creatures ye punch
artifacts.tooltip.item.vampiric_glove.ch: Has a chance to absorb the life force of creatures ye punch
artifacts.tooltip.item.villager_hat: Increases yer bartering skills with Landlubbers
item.artifacts.shock_pendant: Jewel o' Flash o' the Skies
